data.title: Coffee at the kofi annan institute for global citizenship - CampusReel
data.meta_description: Macalester College reviews from current students. Coffee at the kofi annan institute for global citizenship Matt takes you to one of his favorite places to get free coffee on campus, the Kofi Annan Institute for Global Citizenship, which houses the Civic Engagement Center and the Center for Study Away.
data.text:
The following is an computer-generated summary of the video transcript.

I'm here at the Kofi, another institute for global citizenship, located here in Markham Hall, one of my favorite places to study, and not in the least part because they give out free coffee, huge perkier on campus, something I really enjoy. Locating this building is sort of the gate weight off campus. It's where our center for study away is located, as well as our Civic Engagement Center, which helps students volunteer off campus. It also hosts the international round table that happens in the fall every year. This year it was just about mass incarceration, so that was very interesting. Oh, and right next to me is a bust of Kofi on on, um, the building's namesake right here.
